title: Creativity-Driven Language Education: Intermediate Competency Development via Outcomes-Based Instruction

context.additional_context: Project-based learning to enhance linguistic creativity and practical communication skills in a bring-your-own-device (BYOD) environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more creative language expression strategies through outcome-based instruction.
Learners can collaborate with peers to complete creative language projects (e.g., storytelling, content creation) on assigned themes (career/daily life).
Learners can analyze the creativity and effectiveness of language use with over 80% accuracy through self-assessment and feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
